description: The Karo Red Mirror Plant is the perfect shrub to add decadence to your landscaping or patio. This Coprosma's glossy green leaves ombre to a deep burgundy. The densely packed leaves of this drought toerant plant add rich color to your space.

This easy-care pyramidal shrub, the Mirror Plant (Coprosma regens) delights with marbled hues to intensify the winter garden and brighten summer landscapes in warmer climates. Their dramatic foliage color make them a favorite. Place in groupings or combine with colorful succulents.
data.title: Karo Red Mirror Bush 'Coprosma'
